hero.subtitle: Connect with local players, schedule matches, and level up your game. TennisMate makes finding your next opponent effortless.

features.title: Everything you need to play
features.subtitle: Powerful features designed to help you spend less time organizing and more time playing.

smart_matching.title: Smart Matching
smart_matching.description: Find players who match your skill level and location preferences.

availability.title: Availability
availability.description: Set your playing schedule and see when others are free to play.

location.title: Location Based
location.description: Discover tennis partners in your immediate area with distance filtering.

skill_levels.title: Skill Levels
skill_levels.description: Filter players by NTRP rating or general skill level (Beginner to Pro).

how_it_works.title: How it Works
how_it_works.subtitle: Get on the court in 3 simple steps

1.title: Discover
1.description: Find players in your area based on skill level and availability.

2.description: Chat, schedule matches, and build your tennis network.

3.title: Play
3.description: Meet on the court and enjoy the game you love.

consent.title: Privacy & Location
consent.description: We use your location to find tennis partners nearby. Your precise location is stored securely and only used for matching. You can decline, but location-based features will be disabled.
